remarks: Inner product with a zero second argument.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Feb-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)

ip0r $p |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ A e. V ) -> ( A ., .0. ) = Z ) $.
